FuncDef:
The cmp-request origin-authentication-method command configures the authentication method used for initial request (IR) through CMPv2.
The undo cmp-request origin-authentication-method command restores the default authentication method used for IR through CMPv2. The cmp-request origin-authentication-method command configures the authentication method used for initial request (IR) through CMPv2. The undo cmp-request origin-authentication-method command restores the default authentication method used for IR through CMPv2. By default, the authentication method used for IR through CMPv2 is MAC.
